title: Fiesta Au Gratin
directions: Prepare Idahoan Au Gratin Homestyle Casserole according to stovetop or oven directions.
Add salsa, corn, cheese and chicken in the last 5 minutes of cook time.
Finish cooking until all ingredients are heated through and sauce is thickened.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) package Idahoan Au Gratin Homestyle Casserole
